page.title: 17Bramhope: Children's Games
page.content: Children in Bramhope play a variety of games from the traditional to the technological.At school,seasons determine which sports are played.{ Cricket,tennis and rounders are favourites in Summer, football is popular all the year round.Summer sees the return of 'Elastics' 'Handstands' 'Hopping Polo' and 'Tig'. In Autumn almost the whole school can be seen playing 'Conkers'. Many would like walls for ball games or playground markings for 'Hopscotch'. Others suggest climbing frames or tracks for{ 'Radio Controlled Vechicles'. Some, mainly girls,spend their playtimes just talking.56% play with the same friends at home and at school,63% with siblings.Outdoor games are similar to those at school,except 'Bike Riding' which is the most popular.38% play with 'Radio Controlled Cars.'
